response.explain: The error message indicates that the oven was already open, so the action to open the oven was unnecessary and caused an error.
response.subtask:
(1) Take the meat out of the oven
(2) Heat the meat
(3) Put the heated meat on the plate
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    # Subtask 1: Take the meat out of the oven
    pork_chop = registry(env,"pork_chop_188")
